eu.sapere.middleware.agent
Class RemoteConnectionManager

java.lang.Object
  eu.sapere.middleware.agent.RemoteConnectionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class RemoteConnectionManager
extends Object
implements Runnable

Act as a skeleton for a Remote Connection Manager, that is accepts incoming active connections from remote nodes, instantiates a Sapere Agent in order to manage the incoming LSA and forwards events to the remote node.

Author:
Gabriella Castelli (UNIMORE)

          The name of the Remote Connection Manager
